suite.name: Check Availabitity of Product

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Open Page
kw.doc: open browser

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Login
kw.doc: login

kw.name: Wait For Element
kw.doc: all typed of waits

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.msg: Page should have contained element '//h2[contains(text(),'iPhone XS تک سیم کارت ظرفیت 512 گیگابایت')]' but did not.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Exit For Loop If
kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing for loop if the ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.
